Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it could significantly benefit you. For this exceptional piece, I'm proposing an offer of $150. I trust this price reflects not only the quality of the product but also the opportunity for you to experience its benefits. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
